lib/hope/logger/log_helper.h

00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include "hope/logger/stack_buffer.h"
00012 #include "hope/logger/log_level.h"
00013 
00014 #include "hope/components/detector.h"
00015 
00016 #include <charconv>
00017 
00018 namespace hope {
00019 
00020     class logger;
00021 
00025     struct log_helper final {
00026 
00027         log_helper(logger& logger_instance, log_priority priority);
00028         ~log_helper();
00029 
00035         template <typename T>
00036         using write_method_t = decltype(std::declval<T>().write(std::declval<log_helper&>()));
00037 
00045         template<typename T>
00046         using write_function_t = decltype(write(std::declval<log_helper&>(), std::declval<const T&>()));
00047 
00053         template<typename T>
00054         using write_enum_function_t = decltype(write_enum(std::declval<log_helper&>(), std::declval<const T&>()));
00055 
00061         template <typename T>
00062         struct value_wrapper final {
00063             value_wrapper(const T& val)
00064                 : value(val) { }
00065         
00066             const T& value;
00067         };
00068 
00079         template<typename T>
00080         friend log_helper& operator<<(log_helper& helper, const T& value){
00081             if constexpr (is_detected_v<write_method_t, T>) {
00082                 value.write(helper);
00083             } else if constexpr (is_detected_v<write_function_t, T>) {
00084                 write(helper, value);
00085             } else if constexpr ( std::is_enum_v<T>){
00086                 if constexpr(is_detected_v<write_enum_function_t, T>)
00087                     write_enum(helper, value);
00088                 else
00089                     helper.write_impl(int(value)); // if enum writer had not been set, write enum as integer
00090             } else {
00091                 helper.write_impl(value);
00092             }
00093             return helper;
00094         }
00095 
00101         template<typename T>
00102         friend log_helper& operator<<(log_helper&& helper, const T& value) {
00103             helper << value;
00104             return helper;
00105         }
00106 
00110         template <typename T>
00111         static value_wrapper<T> build_value(const T& value) {
00112             return value_wrapper<T>(value);
00113         }
00114     private:
00115 
00116         void write_impl(const void* data, std::size_t size);
00117         void write_impl(std::string_view data);
00118         void write_impl(const std::string& data);
00119 
00120         template<typename T>
00121         void write_impl(const value_wrapper<T>& object){
00122             m_buffer.put(" [", 2);
00123             write(object);
00124             m_buffer.put("] ", 2);
00125         }
00126 
00127         template<typename T>
00128         void write_impl(const T& val) {
00129             constexpr bool is_suitable = std::is_integral_v<T> || std::is_floating_point_v<T>;
00130             if constexpr (is_suitable) {
00131                 std::array<char, 100> buffer{};
00132                 auto&& [ptr, ec] = std::to_chars(buffer.data(), buffer.data() + buffer.size(), val);
00133                 write_impl(buffer.data(), std::size_t(ptr) - std::size_t(buffer.data()));
00134             }
00135             static_assert(is_suitable, "<--- hope::logger: An attempt was made to write value of unregistered type.");
00136         }
00137 
00138         stack_buffer m_buffer;  // Contains all written bytes
00139         logger& m_logger;   // Ref to the global logger, all bytes had to be written there
00140         log_priority m_priority;
00141     };
00142 
00143 }
00144 
00145 #define HOPE_INTERIOR_LOG(PRIORITY, logger) if((logger).should_write(PRIORITY)) hope::log_helper(logger, PRIORITY) <<
00146 #define HOPE_INTERIOR_LOG_TRACE(PRIORITY, logger) if((logger).should_write(PRIORITY)) hope::log_helper(logger, PRIORITY) <<  __FUNCTION__ << " "
00147 #define HOPE_VAL(V) hope::log_helper::build_value(V)
